project.description: This is a test that starts and executes a CloVR Comparative pipeline run with local credentials

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e source /opt/vappio-scripts/clovrEnv.sh
DATE=`date +"%m-%d-%Y-%T" | sed -e 's/:/_/g'`
vp-add-dataset --tag-name=bifidobacter_genbank_tag_local -o /opt/hudson/pangenome_data/bifidobacter_genbank_files/Bifidobacterium_adolescentis_ATCC_15703/AP009256.gbk /opt/hudson/pangenome_data/bifidobacter_genbank_files/Bifidobacterium_longum_infantis_ATCC_15697/CP001095.gbk
vp-describe-protocols --config-from-protocol=clovr_comparative \ -c input.GENBANK_TAGS=bifidobacter_genbank_tag_local \ -c params.OUTPUT_PREFIX=bifidobacter \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_NAME='local' \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_CREDENTIAL='local' \ -c cluster.TERMINATE_ONFINISH=false \ -c pipeline.PIPELINE_DESC="Hudson CloVR Comparative Test local" \ > /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE}
TASK_NAME=`vp-run-pipeline --print-task-name --pipeline-config /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE} --overwrite`
if [ "$?" == "1" ]; then echo "vp-run-pipeline failed to run" exit 1 fi
vp-describe-task --name local --exit-code --block $TASK_NAME
exit $?
